alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 08 at 9:53PM EST until January 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Anne Arundel County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 10 AM EST Wednesday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, the boardalk at Annapolis City Dock is underwater. Floodwaters also are affecting numerous roads in Annapolis and on the Naval Academy Campus, along with structures throughout the neighboring area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 4 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is expected at Annapolis during the high tide cycles Tuesday afternoon and Tuesday night. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Severn River at Annapolis MLLW Categories - Minor 2.6 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.2 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 4.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/02 AM 1.7 0.3 1.3 1.0 None 10/02 AM 4.9 3.5 4.5 3.0 Moderate 10/04 PM 3.5 2.1 2.5 1.0 Moderate 11/03 AM 1.9 0.5 1.5 0.5 None 11/05 PM 2.3 0.9 1.2 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
